Text: We're almost at the kitchen.
Right. I hope things are going smoothly—
Huh? I can hear their voices even from here.

Beta... Are you seriously planning on serving food that
crazy at the party?
I-Is there something wrong with it?

Judging by their voices, it seems they are
getting along.
...Let's hurry and find out.

In the Garden's kitchen, their voices echo along with
the sound of clanging knives and sizzling frying pans.
The presentation is just as important as the taste!

Right? This dish is based on the scenery that
Master Shadow said was breathtaking!

Black omelet rice, like Master Shadow's gallant
profile, in black soup as dark as the night sky—

Huh?! The presentation is important?! It looks awful!
How did you make it pitch-black like that?!

Th-That's a bit harsh, isn't it? I think it would be
a shame for a cook to not show a bit of originality.

Do you plan on serving that plain old dish, Epsilon?
Are you just going for taste?

What?! All of us are going to eat it, so I think it's
important to keep the recipe simple!

Being able to recreate it the day of the event is key!
This is why I can't stand amateur cooks like you!
What did you say?!

They argue and bicker, but samples of their dishes
are placed on the table one after another.

Despite how much they argue, that doesn't slow them
down from cooking up a storm...
Yes, they sure get along well, huh? Heheh...
Y-Yes, probably... Let's see how they're doing.
After you, then.
Whew... Let's calm down a little and talk.

Just listen, will you? We're cooking for the party,
so the presentation has to be gorgeous, right?

Don't you think the food we serve to Master Shadow
should be at this level?
Y-Yeah, I get that...

I don't want to cut corners when it comes to our
lord's food, but when I think of everyone else...
How are you two doing?
Huh?! Lady Alpha?! Gamma?
Wh-When did you get here?

We've been watching you since your spirited
discussion. Things are going well I presume?
Y-Yes, of course! Right, Beta?
Y-Yes! Totally smooth! Haha...ha...

Lady Alpha's just being straight forward,
but she comes off as a bit scary...

We were just sharing our opinions, not fighting!
Nope! Not fighting at all!

Want to try some? I'm confident in the taste, but
getting an objective opinion would be great...!

Oh, I'm not worried about the taste, but I'll try
some since we're here.
I'll try some too.
Alpha and Gamma begin tasting the food.

It's delicious...I'd expect nothing less. Especially the
sauce. Shadow would love this type of sandwich.

This...artistic...cuisine is also somehow fascinating.
I think it has the same mysteriousness as our lord.

If you can make food of this quality, there's no need
to intervene. Please continue.

I agree. If you keep this up, I'm sure the food will
be spectacular.
But...can I just say one thing?
What is it?

It might be hard, but I'm hoping for something fresh
and new for the anniversary party.

Something expensive would be too boring. If we could
get creative or source some rare ingredients...
Get creative...
Rare ingredients...

Beta, you were talking about the importance of
presentation, right? I think that's good. And you
had a good point too, Epsilon.

But, failure is not an option on the day of the party.
When you have a responsibility, sometimes you need
to know when to give up on something.

So I think it's important to overcome adversity
with ideas.

I'm not saying that you have no choice, of course,
but I'd be happy if you could give it your all.

You're right...I got a little worked up. Your advice
was very helpful, thank you.

It's a party, so I'll do everything possible to
ensure everyone enjoys themselves!

Understood, Gamma. Creativity is our strong point.
Leave it to us!

We're counting on you both! If you need anything,
you can ask Delta for help too.

D-Delta... Maybe I'll get her to look for some rare
ingredients... Hahaha...
I agree, that sounds like a good idea.

There are only a few days left until the party...
but let's all pull together to make it a success!
Yeah!
